file.title: Consist no

p.text: The command searches any specified characters in the initial text. If even one character is found, the command returns "No". If there are no specified characters in the text, the command returns "Yes". For example, if in the text "Algorithm is a good program" it is necessary to check the presence of characters "job8", the command would return "No" (because the text contains a character "o").
